text: Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: If he/she accepts more than that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
ถ้ายินดียิ่งกว่านั้นเป็น นิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
Should he accept more than that, it entails expiation with forfeiture.
